code:
import{URL}from"./../../config";import axios from'axios';// GET
export async function searchSupplierData(){if(!localStorage["suppliers"]){try{const response=await axios.get(URL+"proveedores",{headers:{Authorization:localStorage["token"]}});localStorage["suppliers"]=JSON.stringify(response.data);return response.data;}catch(error){if(error.response&&error.response.status===403){console.error('Acceso denegado. Redireccionando a /login...');localStorage.clear();window.location.href='/login';}else{console.error('Error al obtener los proveedores:',error);}return[];}}return JSON.parse(localStorage["suppliers"]);}// DELETE
export async function removeSupplierData(remove){try{await axios.delete(URL+"proveedores",{headers:{Authorization:localStorage["token"]}});let suppliers=await searchSupplierData();suppliers=suppliers.filter(supplier=>supplier.Id_Proveedor!==remove);localStorage["suppliers"]=JSON.stringify(suppliers);return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error al eliminar el proveedor:',error);return false;}}// PUT
export async function editSupplierData(edit){try{await axios.put(URL+"proveedores",edit,{headers:{Authorization:localStorage["token"]}});let suppliers=await searchSupplierData();suppliers=suppliers.map(supplier=>{if(supplier.Id_Proveedor===edit.Id_Proveedor){return edit;}return supplier;});localStorage["suppliers"]=JSON.stringify(suppliers);return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error al editar el proveedor:',error);return false;}}// POST
export async function saveSupplierData(supplier){try{await axios.post(URL+"proveedores",supplier,{headers:{Authorization:localStorage["token"]}});let suppliers=await searchSupplierData();suppliers.push(supplier);localStorage["suppliers"]=JSON.stringify(suppliers);return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error al guardar el proveedor:',error);return false;}}
